content: Hello there, my name is Peter Schmidt. I am the landlord of the apartment in Magdeburg that we have been discussing. It's a pleasure to meet you!
name: Peter Schmidt

content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had a conversation with Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Yi-Nuo expressed interest in renting the unfurnished one-bedroom apartment in the city center. We had a discussion about the rental price and reached an agreement.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the rental price for the apartment. We were discussing what would be a fair price considering the location, amenities, and condition of the apartment. After some negotiations, we agreed on a price that was acceptable to both parties.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: Yes, we agreed on a final price.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: The final price we agreed upon was 825 Euro per month.
name: Peter Schmidt

content:
On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, 
how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: I rate the likeability of the negotiation partner as a 10.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: No, I did not feel discriminated or offended at any point during the negotiation. Yi-Nuo Wang was respectful and professional throughout the conversation.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator
